group_1.textRight: She's the one who's been@hunting other Magical Girls!
The Magical Girl Killer?@[chara:200600:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_021.exp.json]She's the one behind all that?!

group_1.textLeft: Oooh...@Does this mean I'm famous now?
Not that I care, really.
I'm just here to ask you @a few questions.

group_1.textRight: What kind of questions?

group_1.textLeft: Questions about Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: You...@[chara:200500:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_021.exp.json]Do you know something about Kamihama?!

group_1.textLeft: What? Didn't you hear what I just said?@[chara:400200:motion_300]I'm asking you!
Why are you here, anyway?@What are you up to?
Tell me everything you know@about this place...

group_1.textRight: We don't know a damn thing,@and it's not like we'd tell ya if we did!
So like Mami just asked...
If ya know anything about Kamihama...
We wanna hear it.

group_1.textLeft: Wait, why are you guys @investigating Kamihama?

group_1.textRight: Because something's not right.

group_1.textLeft: How so?

group_1.textRight: Didn't you feel it when you got here?@This town is abnormal.

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm... I mean yeah, there're more@Witches than you can shake a stick at.

group_1.textRight: Exactly.
So we came here to figure out why.
That's it.
Unfortunately for you, we do@not have any hidden motives.
Nor do we have any more information for@you... Guess you'll have to look elsewhere.

group_1.textLeft: You're kidding...@You guys don't know anything either?

group_1.textRight: You heard her!@Now get outta here!

group_1.textLeft: So you're useless, is what you're saying.
Don't worry.
This won't hurt...@Much.

group_1.textRight: Is she crazy?!

group_1.textLeft: Ready to play?
Too slow! Too slow! WAY too slow![se:4055_landing_rotationjump_vh]

group_1.textRight: Ugh!@She's too frickin' fast!
She's not fast!@This is her magic!
She's slowing down everything around us.
She just seems fast to us.
So that's her trick!
Well, now that we know that...
We'd better come up with some@sorta plan to counteract it!
You don't need to tell me twice.@Hya![se:5002_shooting_02_s]

group_1.textLeft: Hehe, nice one!@You almost had me there!
The key word being "almost."@I can't give you too much credit!

group_1.textRight: Nrrrgh! Quit buzzin' around like a@damn mosquito and let me smash ya!

group_1.textLeft: Mosquito?@Should I take that as a compliment?

group_1.textRight: Who...the hell...would?!@Hyah!

group_1.textLeft: Hahaha!@You miâ€”
*Gasp*

group_1.textRight: What the?!

group_1.textLeft: No...my tea!@No, no, no!!!

group_1.textRight: The heck's gotten into ya all of a sudden?
Oh!@Your attack hit one of her shopping bags.

group_1.textLeft: Ruined... It's all ruined...@I can't take this back to her now!!!
You... You wrecked it...@You wrecked all of Oriko's tea!

group_1.textRight: What the heck are ya talkin' about?!

group_1.textLeft: I'll never forgive you... Never!!![chara:400200:cheek_-1:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json]
[textRed:...URRRRRRAAAAAAGGGHHH!!!]

group_1.textRight: Here she comes!
Yeah, an' she looks pretty pissed!
